name: Dance Mancer
description:
Made for BGS Game Jam XVII!

Play a fun rhythm game of bringing ghosts back into their graves while skeletons dance to entertain you!

This game is not for sale or resale. 

Cover song is a cover of copyrighted music. 

3D Modeling - Shannon Zagst

2D Art - Shannon Zagst & David Meza

Game Design - David Meza

Music - David Meza

Programming - David Meza

(with additional support by John F.)

VFX - David Meza
